Preference.android:title: Most settings are now per-app
Preference.android:summary: This menu is now left with only several global settings. Most other settings were moved to per-app settings which means you can set different options for every app. You can get to them by clicking on app name in app list (where you check/uncheck apps) or you can edit default settings, which you can find at the top of the app list.

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable new notifications popping up. You can still see them by launching app manually and opening Active or History. Syncs with "Notifications ON/OFF" switch on Pebble
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable popup entirely

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When unchecked, Notification Center will still collect notifications and send them after Pebble reconnects.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable notify when Pebble is disconnected

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disable new notifications popping up when phone is in vibrate or in silent mode
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable notify when in silent mode
Enable Failed fix
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable fix for \'Failed\' message when you execute action in native notification. DO NOT CHECK WITHOUT ENABLING INCLUDED XPOSED MODULE, otherwise your Pebble will reboot after executing action.
One-click toggle to completely enable/disable vibration. Syncs with "Vibration ON/OFF" switch on Pebble.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable vibration entirely

EditTextPreference.android:summary: After this amount of seconds being idle, watchapp will close automaticaly. You can press any button on watch to stop this timer. Enter 0 to disable.
EditTextPreference.android:title: Auto-Close timeout

EditTextPreference.android:summary: After this amount of seconds being idle, watchapp will stop vibrating periodically. Enter 0 to vibrate indefinitely. Has no effect if periodic vibration is turned off (in per-app settings).
EditTextPreference.android:title: Periodic vibration timeout

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: You need to ENABLE DEVELOPER CONNECTION inside Pebble app to get this to work. It is also a bit buggy (sometimes app won't close), use on your own risk. This feature does not work on Pebble Time at the moment.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Close to previously running app

ListPreference.android:title: Light screen on notification
ListPreference.android:summary: Turn on display light when notification arrives

EditTextPreference.android:summary: If above setting is on, light will be on for this amount of seconds
EditTextPreference.android:title: Light timeout

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Show actions menu instantly
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: When this is checked, blank actions menu will be displayed instantly after pressing the button with text delayed. This allows you to pick action even before text arrives from phone if you know where it is (for example if you know dismiss is first option, you can just quickly double tap). When unchecked, menu will appear when text arrives.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable debug logging
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable logging to PebbleNotificationCenter\\log.txt. Use when debugging.
